author: Pamela Muse
text:
Glendale, AZ is interested in any local governments that have implemented the “electronic receiving report function: in PeopleSoft’s Financials”?
Glendale has PeopleSoft but has not implemented this feature.  Are you using the electronic receiving report function and if so, is it doing what you wanted/expected it to do?
Any information you can share, is appreciated!
Pam Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-96450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: PeopleSoft - Electronic Receiving Reports Function
